strapiPost.title: Allegiant Carries Record Passengers Two Consecutive Months
strapiPost.content:
Allegiant Air, a low-fare airline at Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA), has put more passengers on planes than it ever has at XNA for the second consecutive month.

  • By the seat: 14,947 passengers flew Allegiant from XNA in June, marking the airline’s best month until July. 16,020 people boarded Allegiant flights in July out of the airport’s total 79,699 passengers. 
  • Load factors: Last month, Allegiant had the airport’s highest load factor, filling 89% of its seats. American Airlines (XNA’s largest airline) served 83% of its seats but accounted for 46% of all travelers. United Airlines had a load factor of 88%, Delta’s was a solid 87%, Breeze Airways filled 77% of its seats, and Frontier Airlines brought up the tail number with 73%. 

Read the Fare Flight story HERE.
